ABSTRACT
1 In the past few years, there has been a growing significance of interactions between human
workersandautomatedsystemsthroughoutthefactoryfloor. Whereverstaticormobilerobots,such
as automated guided vehicles, operate autonomously, a protected environment for personnel and
machinesmustbeprovidedby,e.g.,safe,deterministicandlow-latencytechnologies.

everstaticormobilerobots,such
as automated guided vehicles, operate autonomously, a protected environment for personnel and
machinesmustbeprovidedby,e.g.,safe,deterministicandlow-latencytechnologies. Anothertrend
inthisareaistheincreaseduseofwirelesscommunication,offeringahighflexibility,modularity,
andreducedinstallationandmaintenanceefforts. Thisworkpresentsatestbedimplementationthat
integrates a wireless framework, employing IO-Link Wireless (IOLW) and a private 5G cellular
network, toorchestrateacompleteexampleprocessfromsensorsandactuatorsupintotheedge,
representedbyaprogrammablelogiccontroller(PLC). Latencyassessmentsidentifythesystem’s
cycletimeaswellasopportunitiesforimprovement. Aworst-caseestimationshowstheattainable

digitalsensor-to-edgecloudinfrastructurewithinanindustrialsettinghasbeenpreviouslyproposed[1,2]. Combining

technologies,includingWiFiandBluetooth.

2 Essentialtechnologies

frequencychannelsisimplementedtoimprovecoexistencebehavior[6,7]. Inthesamecell,uptothreeW-Masterscan

20W-Devices[4,6]. Additionally,roamingcapabilitiesbetweendifferentW-Mastersarepossible[8,9]. Deterministic
mediaaccessisacrucialfeature,withbidirectionalcommunicationsegmentedintocyclesandsub-cycles. Aminimum
cyclelasts5ms,containingthreesub-cyclesof1.664mseach. Frequencyhoppingtakesplacebetweenthesub-cycles,
with the hopping distance being greater than the typical coherence bandwidth to increase transmission robustness,
whichisanessentialaspectforsafetyapplications[10]. Furthermore,thisresults,inconjunctionwithothermeasures,
toanerrorprobabilityof10-9[4]. 2.2 Private5GCampusNetwork
5GNewRadio,thesuccessorof4Glong-termevolution(LTE),wasdefinedandspecifiedas3GPPRelease15in2019
[11]. Likeitspredecessor,5Gconsistsofthesameparts,withuserequipment(UE)connectedtoaradioaccessnetwork,
whichinturnisconnectedtoacorenetwork. Twoarchitecturesarespecified: anonstandalone(NSA)architecturewith
a5Gaccessnetworkbeingconnectedtoa4Gcorenetwork,andastandalone(SA)architecturebeingindependentof4G
[11].

urnisconnectedtoacorenetwork. Twoarchitecturesarespecified: anonstandalone(NSA)architecturewith
a5Gaccessnetworkbeingconnectedtoa4Gcorenetwork,andastandalone(SA)architecturebeingindependentof4G
[11]. Anothermajordifferenceistheadaptablesubcarrierspacing(SCS)in5Gonthephysicallayer. LTEhasafixed
SCSof15kHz,resultinginabandwidthperorthogonalfrequency-divisionmultiplexing(OFDM)-symbolof180kHz. In 5G, the SCS is variable between 30 - 240kHz, depending on the frequency range and thus gives a bandwidth
per OFDM-symbol from 360 to 2880kHz. The larger the SCS is set, the lower the time slot per OFDM-symbol
is. 3GPP Release 15 introduces network slicing, dividing a physical network into multiple logical networks with
differentpurposes. Themaincharacteristicsareultrareliablelowlatencycommunications(URLLC),enhancedmobile
broadband (eMBB) and mMTC, each with specific performance goals as depicted in [3], e.g., URLLC aims for a
reliabilityof99.999%withalatencyof1ms.
